DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy PEP005 Topical Gel When Used Treat Actinic Keratoses Head ( Face Scalp )

Treatment immunomodulators , interferon/ interferon inducer systemic medication suppress immune system : within 4 week .
